Audio.Locality: Cantareira park entrance, Sao Paulo state
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Song from an unseen bird in dense understory. Bret Whitney was with me and couldn't rule out Geotrygon violacea, but this song matches Leptotila rufaxilla songs on XC from SE Brazil.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Herpsilochmus rufimarginatus,Myiothlypis leucoblephara,Trogon surrucura,Camptostoma obsoletum,Drymophila ferruginea
